hero.title: xMatix Service
hero.description1: Dispatch smarter. Resolve faster. Govern outcomes.
hero.description2:
xMatix Service helps organizations plan, execute, and govern service operations across field and support teams. 
 Every service request follows a standardized, auditable workflow from intake to resolution

cardsData.title: The problem
cardsData.content: Most service organizations struggle with fragmented systems, manual coordination, SLA breaches, and limited visibility into service execution.
list: Technician dispatch depends on tribal knowledge

cardsData.title: The xMatix Approach
cardsData.content: xMatix Service standardizes how service requests are routed, executed, and resolved so every case follows a governed and measurable process.

keyCapabilities.title: Core Capabilities
keyCapabilities.description2: xMatix Service modernizes service execution without replacing existing ticketing, CRM, or ERP systems while improving speed, visibility, and control.

cardsData.title: End to End Service Workflow Execution
cardsData.description: Design and run service workflows from request intake to resolution and closure across teams and channels.

cardsData.title: Intelligent Dispatch and Assignment
cardsData.description: Assign work based on skills, availability, location, and priority to improve first time resolution.

cardsData.title: SLA and Policy Enforcement
cardsData.description: Enforce response times, escalation rules, and approval thresholds automatically during execution.

cardsData.title: Real Time Service Visibility
cardsData.description: Track status, delays, handoffs, and outcomes in real time across field and support operations.

cardsData.title: Human and System Action Orchestration
cardsData.description: Coordinate technician actions, approvals, inventory updates, and system integrations across service ecosystems.

requestADemo.heading: See xMatix Service in Action
requestADemo.description: Deliver consistent service outcomes, reduce SLA breaches, and gain operational clarity without disrupting existing systems.
